item.title: FFmpeg on AMI Linux and CentOS the easy way
item.description: FFmpegis a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and stream audio and video. All you need to do is just install one more repository: http://rpmfusion.org/Configuration Done. ffmpeg version 0.10.15 Copyright (c) 2000-2014 the FFmpeg developers<br /> built on Aug 30 2014 15:49:19 with gcc 4.4.7 20120313 (Red Hat 4.4.7-3)<br /> Obviously there is no fun with with FFmpeg if you don’t have anything to convert. I needed to crop vertical videos from iPad to square – Vinelike format.
